name: Johnny Rider - Shooting N Driving!
description:
You Drive and you Shoot. That’s all you do, but this deceptively simple game mixes up the action and racks up the adrenalin with surprises action every corner to ensure you never get bored. 🔥🔥🔥

A hyper-casual game I made at my last job .

*The game is free and available on the Play Store.
